body: You summon a swarm of screeching, mischievous monkeys. The swarm understands and obeys your commands and has the statistics of a monkey swarm. Creatures failing a saving throw against the mad monkeys' distraction attack are deafened for 1 minute as well as nauseated. The monkeys attempt one disarm or steal combat maneuver each turn as a free action against any creature that begins its turn in the swarm, using your caster level plus your casting ability score bonus (Intelligence for wizards; Wisdom for druids and oracles; Charisma for bards, sorcerers, and summoners) for its CMB. Recovering an item from the monkeys requires a successful disarm or steal attempt against that CMB + 10. An object stolen by the monkeys takes swarm damage each round the swarm is in possession of the object.
description: Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.
level_text: Bard: 3; Skald: 3; Druid: 3; Hunter: 3; Sorcerer: 3; Wizard: 3; Arcanist: 3; Hunter: 3; Summoner: 3; Hunter: 3
name: Mad Monkeys
